words.example: She is currently working on the project.
We are presently reviewing your application.
The company is now expanding into Asian markets.
We normally hold meetings on Mondays.
E-mail messages are typically more concise.
This term is commonly used in business.
The policy generally applies to all employees.
He usually arrives at the office by 9.
We frequently update our product catalog.
Delays often occur during peak season.
The system sometimes requires a restart.
We occasionally hire part-time staff.
Reports are regularly submitted to headquarters.
Prices are periodically adjusted.
The board meets every month.

words.meaning: 일 년에 한 번·한 달에 한 번
words.example: The audit is conducted once a year.
We will send the contract soon.
The manager will join us shortly.
Payment will be processed immediately.
The conference will be held next week.
Please check the upcoming schedule.
The shipment will arrive tomorrow.
He previously worked at the branch office.
She was formerly the head of marketing.
The agreement was signed two weeks ago.
This building was once a warehouse.
The meeting was held yesterday.
The company recently launched a new product.
The report was submitted last day.
There was an issue past day.
We have been very busy lately.
Sales have persistently exceeded targets.
The system has run continuously.
The documents have already been filed.
She has worked here since 2020.
He has been with the company for the last 10 years.
